messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] spelling games
messages.msgSnippet: A lot of schooly folks bought the Turbo Twist spelling game for their kids (6-7 yo) this xmas. Supposedly, it makes spelling fun? My kids really
messages.messageBody:
<<<<> A lot of schooly folks bought the Turbo Twist spelling game for their
kids (6-7 yo) this xmas. Supposedly, it makes spelling fun?>>>>>

My kids really like to play with their Turbo Twist things, we have several.
Zach has been fiddling around with multiplication.

Adriane says that emailing her friends has helped her spelling.

Julie S.
